entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
